t: Hallmark Cards - Wikipedia
s: 2 days ago - In addition to greeting cards, Hallmark also manufactures such products as party goods, gift wrap, and stationery. Hallmark acquired Binney & Smith in 1984, and would later change its name to Crayola, LLC after its well-known Crayola brand of crayons, markers and colored pencils.

t: HALLMARK HOPING TO REACH CRITICAL MASS WITH ITS NEW BRAND OF GREETING CARDS
s: August 2, 2024 - KANSAS CITY, Mo. - Some supermarket chains may begin merchandising a new brand of greeting cards with the Hallmark name on the back beginning next year.The brand, Expressions from Hallmark, was announced here late last month.
